name: Pressure Plate
flavor: This mechanism acts as a trigger for another linked mechanism, and is skillfully hidden from view in the floor.

stats.name: Typical Space
stats.value: One square, up to a 4 x 4-square area

stats.name: Link
stats.value: A pressure plate is linked to another mechanism that it activates when triggered.

effects.effect: As a maneuver, a creature adjacent to a pressure plate can make an **Agility test**.
effects.t1: The creature triggers the pressure plate.
effects.t2: The pressure plate is deactivated but the creature is slowed (EoT).
effects.t3: The pressure plate is deactivated and doesn't trigger.

effects.effect: The pressure plate is calibrated to be triggered by creatures or objects of a particular size. The pressure plate triggers when a creature or object of the appropriate size enters its area.
The linked mechanism is activated. A pressure plate automatically resets and can be triggered repeatedly.
effects.name: Effect

effects.effect: The pressure plate is a tripwire, which can trigger once and must be manually reset. A concealed tripwire can be discovered with an **easy Intuition test**.
The pressure plate is hidden until triggered or detected.
